column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I will never forget the first time I viewed "The Praying Jew"
column2: a painting by Marc Chagall.  I literally forgot where I was momentarily.  There was another visit when I was captivated by Pablo Picasso's The Old Guitarist
column3: one of the most beautiful images I've ever seen.  The Art Institute also has a piece by my favorite artist
column6: if you just want to relive high school Art 101
column7: there are the classics- American Gothic
